Key Match Events: Nikola Jokic recorded a triple-double with 37 points, 18 rebounds, and 15 assists
The Dallas Mavericks had a two-point lead with just over a minute to go but lost in regulation despite a superb performance from Kyrie Irving
Miscellaneous Highlights: Denver Nuggets finished 14/29 from three-point range
Others: The Dallas Mavericks fell 122-120 to the Denver Nuggets on Sunday night, dropping to 5-5 overall and 1-4 in clutch situations
